p: Most records in the top left quadrant of the scatter plot (60–110 coefficient of variation, 6–11 °C) are for L. intermedia (17 out of 23); while most records in the bottom right quadrant of the scatter plot (10–60 coefficient of variation, 11–16 °C) are for L. neivai (83 out of 91) (Fig. 1, Table 1).
